query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS prediction_tracking (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  symbol VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  asset_type ENUM('stock', 'crypto') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'stock',
  prediction_signal ENUM('buy', 'sell', 'hold') NOT NULL,
  confidence DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  entry_price DECIMAL(20,8) NOT NULL,
  target_price DECIMAL(20,8),
  stop_loss DECIMAL(20,8),
  actual_exit_price DECIMAL(20,8),
  actual_return_pct DECIMAL(10,4),
  outcome ENUM('profit', 'loss', 'neutral', 'pending') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  prediction_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  outcome_timestamp TIMESTAMP NULL,
  holding_period_hours INT,
  agent_votes JSON,
  consensus_method VARCHAR(50),
  market_regime VARCHAR(50),
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_user_symbol (user_id, symbol),
  INDEX idx_outcome (outcome),
  INDEX idx_prediction_timestamp (prediction_timestamp)
);

  asset_type ENUM('stock', 'crypto') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'stock',

  target_price DECIMAL(20,8),
  stop_loss DECIMAL(20,8),
  actual_exit_price DECIMAL(20,8),
  actual_return_pct DECIMAL(10,4),
  outcome ENUM('profit', 'loss', 'neutral', 'pending') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  prediction_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  outcome_timestamp TIMESTAMP NULL,
  holding_period_hours INT,
  agent_votes JSON,
  consensus_method VARCHAR(50),
  market_regime VARCHAR(50),
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_user_symbol (user_id, symbol),
  INDEX idx_outcome (outcome),
  INDEX idx_prediction_timestamp (prediction_timestamp)
);
